title: React Counter App
content: Boca Code Week 4 React Counter App: This project is a React Counter App that focuses on practicing the useState() hook in React. It allows users to increment, decrement, and reset a displayed number.

title: Kardashev Scale
content: Boca Code Week 4 Kardashev Scale: This project is a webpage that provides information about the Kardashev Scale, a theoretical framework for measuring the technological advancement of civilizations based on energy utilization. The webpage is built using HTML, Vanilla JavaScript, and CSS.

title: Much-To Do
content: Boca Code Week 5 Much To-do: A to-do app built with React and Firebase that allows users to create and manage tasks in real-time, with automatic data syncing across multiple devices.

title: Timber Login
content: Boca Code Week 5 Timber Login Page: We developed Login Page with React and React Bootstrap that provides an interface for users to log in or sign up.

title: Water Tracker App
content: Boca Code Week 8 Water Tracker Mobile App: This week we designed an mobile app with React Native, Expo, and JS to help track daily water intake and stay hydrated. It allows you to work towards a daily water goal, record the amount of water consume during the day, and view progress towards your goal.
